src:
Povredio se i Drejmond Grin (VIDEO)
Nova muka za Golden Stejt

02 Nov 2019


Nesreća nikada ne dolazi sama, a u slučaju Golden Stejta povede sve malere koji jedan tim mogu da zadese. Kleja Tompsona nema još od kraja prošle sezone, kada je i Kevin Durant zaradio povredu Ahilove tetive zbog koje neće igrati cele godine, ali sada kao igrač Bruklina, pre samo tri dana ruku je slomio Stef Kari, a sada je na listi povređenih i - Drejmond Grin!

Jedan od najboljih "all-round" igrača današnjice povredio je kažiprst leve šake u porazu Golden Stejta od San Antonija (110:127) i njegov status za meč protiv Šarlota je pod znakom pitanja.
Grin se pred novinarima pojavio s zavojima na oba ručna zgloba, s tim što je levi kažiprst bio imobilisan. Na pitanje o čemu se radi, Grin je samo odgovorio da mu je stradao ligament zbog čega će morati na pregled magnetne rezonance.“Povredio sam prst, ligamenti su u pitanju. Tako je, kako je... Ne znam da li ću igrati narednu utakmicu, videćemo. Sada je natečen prst. Nisam mogao da uhvatim loptu lepo već od druge četvrtine. Zbog toga sam pravio dosta dodavanja desnom rukom i tako driblao nalevo. Nadam se da će stvari brzo poboljšati“, izjavio je Grin.
Trener Voriorsa Stiv Ker otkrio je da se ne zna tačan datum povratka Stefa Karija, ali da oporavak neće trajati predugo. Drejmond Grin je na kraju skupio šest poena, osam skokova i sedam asistencija za 34 minuta u igri.

Foto: Reuters
text:
A student of the Municipal School of Judo de La Banda became champion in Salta
02 Nov 2019 by La Banda
The judoca bandeño Josué Arredondo had an outstanding participation in the Fifth Interprovincial Judo Tournament that was held in Salta, on Saturday, October 26, at the Belgrano Club. The competition was organized by the "Güemes" Judo School of sensei Eloy Asís.
On the occasion, Arredondo became champion in the categories Cadets and Kiu Novice. He also participated in the Weight Free category, and fought with judocas of 120 kilograms and older in age. In this category came runner-up, which is very remarkable since the Bandeño athlete is only 15 years old and weighs 90 kilos.
After the successes, the young athlete especially thanked Mayor Pablo Mirolo for his constant support in competing and training at the Municipal Judo School of La Banda, along with his teacher and father, Ricardo Arredondo.
His next sporting challenges are today 2, and on November 9 in San Miguel de Tucumán and on November 16 in Buenos Aires, at the Boca Juniors club.
